name: Dark Souls II: Black Armor Edition
summary:
Immerse yourself into mind-bending environments filled with new twisted monsters and deadly bosses that could only come from the imagination of from software. A wide range of threats will prey on human senses & phobias - auditory hallucinations, vertigo, acrophobia, etc.

This special edition includes a metal case, the soundtrack from the game, and early access to the following weapons and shields:

- Black Flamestone Dagger and Black Flamestone Parma
- Bound Hand Axe and Bound Wooden Shield
- Homunculus Mace and Homunculus Wooden Shield
- Transgressor's Staff and Transgressor's Leather Shield
- Yellow Quartz Longsword and Yellow Quartz Shield
